org.apache.poi.util

Class BoundedInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • org.apache.poi.util.BoundedInputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class BoundedInputStream
extends java.io.InputStream
    This is a stream that will only supply bytes up to a certain length - if its position goes above that, it will stop.

    This is useful to wrap ServletInputStreams. The ServletInputStream will block if you try to read content from it that isn't there, because it doesn't know whether the content hasn't arrived yet or whether the content has finished. So, one of these, initialized with the Content-length sent in the ServletInputStream's header, will stop it blocking, providing it's been sent with a correct content length.

    (这是一个流，只提供一定长度以内的字节-如果其位置超过该长度，它就会停止。这对于包装ServletInputStreams很有用。如果您尝试从ServletInputStream中读取不存在的内容，ServletInputStream将被阻止，因为它不知道内容是否尚未到达或内容是否已经完成。因此，如果以正确的内容长度发送，其中一个用ServletInputStream头部中发送的内容长度初始化，将停止阻塞。)
    Since:
    Commons IO 2.0
    Version:
    $Id$

      BoundedInputStream(java.io.InputStream in)

      Creates a new BoundedInputStream that wraps the given input stream and limits it to a certain size.(创建一个新的BoundedInputStream，它包装给定的输入流并将其限制在一定大小。)

      • isPropagateClose

        public boolean isPropagateClose()
        Indicates whether the close() method should propagate to the underling InputStream.(指示close（）方法是否应传播到底层InputStream。)
        Returns:
        true if calling close() propagates to the close() method of the underlying stream or false if it does not.(如果调用close（）传播到底层流的close（）方法，则为true;如果不传播，则为false。)

      • setPropagateClose

        public void setPropagateClose(boolean propagateClose)
        Set whether the close() method should propagate to the underling InputStream.(设置close（）方法是否应传播到底层InputStream。)
        Parameters:
        propagateClose - true if calling close() propagates to the close() method of the underlying stream or false if it does not.(propagateClose -如果调用close（）传播到基础流的close（）方法，则为真，如果未传播到基础流的close（）方法，则为假。)
